user_query: I need to organize a movie night for my company's team-building event. Can you recommend some movies that are suitable for a diverse group? It would be great if you could provide the movie details and include the cast information. Additionally, fetch some relevant images for these movies to create promotional materials.

TaskList.description: Research and recommend movies suitable for a diverse group.
Fetch detailed information about the recommended movies, including cast information.
Retrieve relevant promotional images for the recommended movies.
Compile all the collected information into a suitable format for promotional materials.
